title: Welcome!
message:
We hope that you enjoy using DSI to store, manage, and share your data.
It looks like this is your first time signing in. Before getting started, you might like to:

view_video2.message: See a video tour of the features of this platform.
view_video2.label: View Video

view_slide_show.message: See a slide show tour of the features of this platform.
view_slide_show.label: View Slide Show

set_theme.message: Set a user interface theme for your preferred style.
set_theme.label: Set Theme

edit_profile.message: Edit your personal profile info for others to see.
edit_profile.label: Edit Profile

invite_contacts.message: Invite contacts from your Google account to connect.
invite_contacts.label: Invite Contacts

import_contacts.message: Import your contacts from your Google account.
import_contacts.label: Import Contacts
